scripts.build_will: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments will.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_all: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments all.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_utils: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments utils.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build: npm run build_will && npm run build_all && npm run build_utils
